test-case.name: fn-outermost-055
test-case.description: Evaluates the "outermost" function with the input sequence not in document order
test-case.test: let $in := for $x in //* order by local-name($x) return $x return deep-equal(fn:outermost($in)/local-name(), fn:outermost(//*)/local-name())

test-case.name: fn-outermost-056
test-case.description: Evaluates the "outermost" function with the input sequence containing duplicates
test-case.test: let $in := for $x in //* order by local-name($x) return $x return deep-equal(fn:outermost(($in, $in))/local-name(), fn:outermost(//*)/local-name())

test-case.name: fn-outermost-057
test-case.description: Evaluates the "outermost" function with the input sequence empty

test-case.name: fn-outermost-058
test-case.description: Check that "outermost" doesn't change node identity
